body.name: CubiCubi 40 Inch Computer Desk with 4 Drawers, Home Office Small Desk with Storage, Modern Study Writing Desk, Rustic Brown
features: Desk with Drawers: 4 large capacity fabric drawers provide plenty of storage space to keep your office or study supplies in order and dust-free, maximum space as well as keeping your desktop tidy.
Reversible Design: The underdesk 4 fabric drawers can be installed on the left or right side according to your needs, good choice for your bedroom, study and office.

Stability Construction: CubiCubi computer desk is constructed of premium metal frame & high-quality MDF Board, Angle bracket provide extra stability which is durable enough to strongly support the stuff on it.
Simple Design & Multifunction：The computer desk works perfectly as a computer desk, office desk, work desk and study desk, ideal for bedroom, home office or in dormitory.

Easy Assembly & Worry-free Service: With detailed instruction and all tools needed for assembly, it will not take much time for installation; We provide professional customer support. If you have any problems related to our desk, please feel free to contact CubiCubi customer service at your earliest convenience

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High-Quality Desktop The waterproof and scratch-resistant desktop is easy to clean Sturdy Steel Structure Solid metal frames ensure the durability of the desk Adjustable feet pads Prevent the floor from being scratched and keep the desk stand stably

reviews.reviewerName: Yet another Amazon CustomerYet another Amazon Customer
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk, at a great price, for telework
reviews.reviewText: Great desk at a great value. The desk arrived a day earlier than expected. The desk was very well packed, with study cardboard protector corners, plenty of styrofoam blocking, and plastic bags over all pieces. The written instructions were clearly written and the installation video here on Amazon was helpful too. It took me about 90 minutes to put it all together by myself using a screwdriver with the same allen wrench type bit the desk came with. The desk is very sturdy and the shelves are large enough to hold a printer and a laptop laying flat. The desktop area has space for a 24-inch wide screen monitor, a laptop on a laptop stand, a bluetooth keyboard and mouse, and extra space to move things around for writing notes or a cup of coffee. The area where you sit has plenty of space for a rolling computer chair. This desk is perfect to setup a telework office in a small apartment or bedroom in a pinch. I highly recommend this desk, I think you'll be hard pressed to find another desk with these specs for this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its pretty good
reviews.reviewText: I started a teaching job where I work mainly from home. I needed a desk to place my papers, binders and text. This desk does the job nicely. I have 4 drawers to put my stuff in but they are not sturdy, I have to push in the metal bar every once in a while cuz they come out of place. but the drawer still stay in place just out of alignment. for me the desk is perfect height as I am only 62 inches. eventually i got a side table for my desk since there is limited space to work with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: Got this on a sale and it was a pretty good deal. Desk was very easy to assemble, probably took like 15 mins. Was thankfully not damaged. Packaging was very minimal and I can see why some people have had damaged ones delivered.Directions are not the best, but once you know that the smaller (medium) screws are the ones that go into the wood you’ll be fine. A 5/32 hex socket on a 1/4 Ratchet makes assembling it go way faster. Although the tool it comes with does work4/5 based off of directions and quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love my desk. Perfect size for my needs. Love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected, a great deal
reviews.reviewText: To start it was well packed, even had end protectors on the corners of the desktop to protect it during shipping. With one person assembly it took 2 1/2 hours and was not difficult. I suggest having your own Allen wrenches handy because the one that comes with it is cheap and stripped very easily. I am very happy with the purchase I like it has adjustable spin knobs on the bottom so you can adjust it to make it level.I recommend this if you want a simple but very sturdy and good looking desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice. Contemporary style.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time we ordered this desk. The first time they made a mistake and sent us a bed frame! So we returned that easily and re-ordered the desk. It does look fine and serves its purpose. My college student really likes it. That being said, it’s pricey for what it is. It’s nice there’s two shelves but would’ve been great if it had a drawer. I do think these are overpriced for a put together desk frame. Price seems about double what it should sell for. I see a ton of these desks for sale on Craigslist in college towns. I would still buy this again. But might check the secondary market first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for Money
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a great value for the price! It took me less than an hour to assemble and came with all the basic tools to build it out. The 47" desk is great for smaller apartments and has room to fit multiple monitors, a laptop and a printer. If you're like me and don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on these large, fancy desks, than this is the one for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: The desk will do what I want it for. Not too bad on assembling, EXCEPT . . . the right outside frame would only allow me to install the two top drawers. For the top 2, it had the proper cut and fitting to add the rails for the drawers but for the lower 2 the frame had not been properly engineered. I thought maybe I had used the wrong piece, but the other similar piece was installed where it should. Of course, it was the final piece to the assembly. No, I didn't call or ask for customer service. . . . after working on it a couple of hours, I just decided to do without the 2 lower drawers . . . not worth the trouble to start over.
